query.ascending: select * from employee order by `salary` asc;
query.decending: select * from employee order by `salary` desc;
query.null value: select * from employee where `First Name` is null;
query.not null: select * from employee where `First Name` is not null;
query.inner join: select * from employee inner join emp_personal_data on employee.`emp id` = emp_personal_data.`emp id`;
query.left join: select * from employee left join emp_personal_data on employee.`emp id` = emp_personal_data.`emp id`;
query.right join: select * from employee right join emp_personal_data on employee.`emp id` = emp_personal_data.`emp id`;
query.self join: select * from employee , emp_personal_data order by employee.`emp id`;,
query.union: select `emp id` from employee union select `emp id` from emp_personal_data;
query.group by: select count(age),age from emp_personal_data group by age;
query.group by having: select count(age),age from emp_personal_data group by age having age = 23;

procedure.create: DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS proced;create procedure proced()
